name: obsidian-quick-emoji
description: Quick, in-editor, emoji inserting. Type ":" to start selecting an emoji to insert.
author: Alec Sibilia

scripts.commit-version: git add . && git commit -m "chore(version): bump version to $npm_package_version"
scripts.tag: git tag -a $npm_package_version -m "chore(release): release $npm_package_version" && git push origin $npm_package_version
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add package.json manifest.json versions.json && pnpm run commit-version
scripts.version:patch: node version-bump.mjs patch && git add package.json manifest.json versions.json && pnpm run commit-version
scripts.version:minor: node version-bump.mjs minor && git add package.json manifest.json versions.json && pnpm run commit-version
scripts.version:major: node version-bump.mjs major && git add package.json manifest.json versions.json && pnpm run commit-version
